original_title: Women’s Cricket team to play ODI and T20I series in England
original_body_lines: The Sri Lanka National Women's Team is set to tour England this month for an ODI and T20I series.
The team will participate in a three-match T20I series as well as a three-match ODI series.
Sri Lanka Cricket said the ODI series is part of the ICC Women's Championship.
The tour will kick off on August 31 with the first T20I match taking place in Hove. The subsequent matches of the T20I series will be held in Chelmsford and Derby, respectively.
Following the T20I series, the ODI series will commence on September 09 in Durham. The second ODI will be played in Northampton, while the third and final ODI will take place in Leicester.
